scripts.namespace: Search for Live-Actions\Doramas\All Related Entries + Correct Watch Order + Copy Entry Title
scripts.name: Watch Order & Adaptations Finder
scripts.description: See the franchise's correct watch order and all entries. Easily check if an entry has Live-Action/Dorama adaptations, and copy the entry or all franchise entries' title(s).

scripts.namespace: Better Buttons To Edit Anime Information
scripts.name: Better Buttons To Edit Anime/Manga Information
scripts.description: The script removes the actual "Edit Anime/Manga Information" drop down menu, and replaces that with Better Buttons To edit the Anime/Manga information.

scripts.namespace: Add End And Start Dates In 1 Click + Reset Dates/All Buttons,
scripts.name: Automatically Add Start/Finish Dates For Animes/Mangas + Helpful Buttons
scripts.description: Selecting Watching/Reading auto adds the start date, and Completed auto adds the finish date. Shows the actual Anime/Manga dates below the Anime/Manga image, which is updated every time you reload or click on Watching/Reading/Completed. Hover the mouse over the dates and click to reset them. This script adds 6 helpful buttons on the Anime/Manga Edit Details Page.

scripts.name: Export Your Anime/Manga XML List On Any Page + Wayback Machine Your Profile.
scripts.description: Download your Anime/Manga XML list on entry pages in a single click. Also, save your profile BBCodes and all pages using the Wayback Machine.

scripts.namespace: Remove Anything Related To Manga On MAL And On Anime.Plus,
scripts.name: Remove Anything Related To Manga On MAL And On Anime.Plus
scripts.description: Removes Anything Related To Manga On MAL And On Anime.Plus

scripts.name: Average Reviews Calculator for MAL
scripts.description: Have a better reviews page with this script that loads all reviews on a single page instead of needing to navigate to the next web pages, and shows the averages of all score categories, if you want to sort the reviews with the same category click on the "Sort Reviews" button.

scripts.name: Remova Propagandas E Temporizadores Ao Baixar Filmes
scripts.description: Abre o link direto de download em sites de torrent que te redirecionam a outros sites, ou fazem aguardar antes de liberar o download.

scripts.name: Total And Remaning Duration Of Any Animes On MAL
scripts.description: Now you can know how much time you will need to finish watching any animes on mal. If you use the MAL episode tracking tool you can also know how much time you still have to spend to finish watching all the remaining episodes.

scripts.name: MAL Summary+Profile Stats With Percentages + Hours
scripts.description: See your profile stats in % + Hours, and see the Summary Stats in %

scripts.name: Generate a List With The Animes/Mangas Titles that were Re-Watched/Re-Read
scripts.description: Easily and quickly generate a list with all ReWatched/ReRead entries and how many times.

scripts.name: Better Buttons to Change The Status Of Animes/Mangas And To Add Scores
scripts.description: Makes easier and faster to select any status/score by enlarging the removing the dropdown selection of those options. Delete any entry from your list, or score + add the whole anime Franchise to your anime list with a single click.

scripts.name: Show Anime Duration With Seconds
scripts.description: Shows the Duration Time with seconds for all animes.

scripts.name: Slither.io Trainer Hack
scripts.description: A Trainer to help you play on slither.io. Reveal the positions of worms close to you.Shows where's the closest and biggest food near you, and can also create 2 danger zone circles around you.

scripts.name: Endless MAL Search Pages
scripts.description: Load the next page automatically and endlessly. You just need to scroll down to the page bottom. Now there's no need to click on the "next page" button ever again!

scripts.name: Show More Info on the Anime/Manga page
scripts.description: Display the More Info button text contents after the synopsis only when an anime/manga has the More Info button. Don't worry about needing to open the More Info button anymore!

scripts.name: Show More Forum Discussions on Anime/Manga Pages
scripts.description: Show up to 15 Forum Discussions on Anime and Manga Pages instead of only +/- 4 Forum Discussions.

scripts.name: Show The Average Score For Animes/Mangas Instead Of N/A
scripts.description: Shows the average score of unpopular entries that have unweighted scores "N/A" on MAL.

scripts.name: Total Duration Time + Total Episodes Of Any Animes Franchises
scripts.description: This is a tool to easily and quickly see how long it will take for you to finish watching the whole anime Franchise, and you can also see how many episodes and entries the Franchise has.

scripts.name: Precise Time Converter on Google
scripts.description: See the precise time conversion results on Google when searching for Hours to Days, Minutes to Hours, Minutes to Milliseconds, or X Hours/Minutes From Now.

scripts.name: MALFunction - "Fix" ERRORS on MAL + Text AutoSaver
scripts.description: When MAL bugs showing ERROR messages or is blank and don't load the script reloads the page until MAL is successfully loaded... The script also AutoSaves any text that you are writing on MAL so that you will never again lose an UnSubmitted text!

scripts.name: Preço Total - Mercado Livre
scripts.description: Veja o preço final total no mercado livre antes de comprar um produto.Opcional = Automaticamente mostra os resultados no modo lista e organiza pelo menor preço.Mostra se o vendedor é bom (nível verde) e recomendado pelo ML ou não.

scripts.name: Better GreasyFork Forum
scripts.description: Automatically show only "All but Script Discussions" on the GreasyFork Forum.

scripts.name: Better GreasyFork Code Reader + JS Beautifier
scripts.description: Show the Codes page of any script on GreasyFork With all code lines background in white and beautify them if you want. With this script, you can also Beautify your UserScripts before publishing them.

scripts.name: AIGPT Everywhere
scripts.description: Mini A.I. floating menu that can define words, answer questions, translate, and much more in a single click and with your custom prompts. Includes useful click to search on Google and copy selected text buttons, along with Rocker+Mouse Gestures and Units+Currency+Time zone Converters, all features can be easily modified or disabled

scripts.name: Who Defriended ME!? - MAL
scripts.description: Now you can easily and quickly know who DeFriended you on MAL!

scripts.name: MAL Custom CSS Override - Working!!!
scripts.description: Replaces the anime/manga lists CSS styles on other users anime/manga lists with your own, or with an style of an user of your choice!

scripts.name: Have we ever talked before? - MAL
scripts.description: Quickly know if you have ever received Private Messages or profile comments from specific users by opening the user's profile page or by hovering over the user image/name on any page on MAL.

scripts.name: Quizlet Show Hidden Flashcards
scripts.description: Show the hidden flashcards and the first explanation in Quizlet without logging in.

scripts.name: Affinity to You
scripts.description: Shows the "Affinity to You" % that all users who have commented on any topic on MAL have with you!

scripts.name: Redirect to Google Translator
scripts.description: Instead of using the small translator on https://google.com get redirected to https://translate.google.com

scripts.name: Night Mode
scripts.description: Adds a transparent dark layer depending on the time of the day to any website to make it less bright.

scripts.name: Series Highlighter - MAL
scripts.description: Highlights entries that already exist on your MAL lists

scripts.name: Mentioner - MAL
scripts.description: Adds a button to mention the @user name on all users who have commented on any topics on MAL. The script also adds a search user name box near the box were the reply is written, so that you can search for any user that commented on that topic and click on the @UserName to auto paste it into the reply box.

scripts.name: Close Up to Date Script Pages
scripts.description: Auto closes the script page that you have already installed and that is already Up to Date. Auto Update and close the script page you have already installed and that ISN'T Up to Date. You have 3 secs to click anywhere to stop this script actions.

scripts.name: Better Related Anime/Manga Reader
scripts.description: Adds line breaks between each Synonyms/Spin-offs/Alternative versions/Sequels/Summary/Others and Side stories titles on entry pages.

scripts.name: Forum Spoilers Hider - MAL
scripts.description: Hides the title of forum topics that aren't episodes/chapters discussion topics on anime/manga pages to avoid spoilers. Hover the mouse over the Forum Topic title to see the original title.

scripts.name: Add new entries to PTW/PTR
scripts.description: Any new entries that you add to your list will be added to your Plan To Watch/Read list.

scripts.name: Openings/Endings Enhancer - MAL
scripts.description: Click on the Play button to watch and listen the FULL OP/END directly on MAL! Click on the OP/END music number to search for the music title on youtube on a new tab.

scripts.name: Auto Downloader
scripts.description: Automatically download on drive.google.com, file4go.net and mp4upload.com

scripts.name: Time Left on Tab - Canvas Instructure
scripts.description: Shows the test/quiz/exam time left on the browser tab and also keeps the questions and time fixed on the screen.

scripts.name: Approved Entries Notifier - MAL
scripts.description: Auto-perform a few checks daily to notify you when specific anime/manga entries get approved or denied.

scripts.name: Auto Subs Enabler - CrunchyRoll
scripts.description: Auto enable subs on your native language by default on CrunchyRoll.

scripts.name: Auto Set Youtube Volume
scripts.description: Choose the default volume for YouTube videos!

scripts.name: Anime/Manga Favorited Status %
scripts.description: See the % of people that have watched and favorited an anime/manga in the entry status page.

scripts.name: Confirm and Upload - Imgur
scripts.description: Auto clicks on the Confirm and Upload button on Imgur.

scripts.name: Search Helper - MAL
scripts.description: Quickly search for the anime/manga title on any websites of your choice.

scripts.name: Endless Google Search Enhancer
scripts.description: Shows up to 100 search results at once on all pages! *Optional= Open (or not) search results on a new tab.

scripts.name: JWPlayer Enhancer
scripts.description: Improves binge watch experiences on any JWPlayer videos online.

scripts.name: Redirect YT video to embedded video
scripts.description: Redirects any opened YT video to the YT embedded video to make the video take up the whole screen.

scripts.name: Open Slack in Browser, not App
scripts.description: Automatically open links in browser instead of app.

scripts.name: Hide Entry Score
scripts.description: Hide the score on anime/manga on MAL as soon as the page loads. To see the entry store hover the mouse over the score.

scripts.name: Better MAL Favs
scripts.description: Choose how you want profile favorites to look like.

scripts.name: Add new entries to your MyAnimeList - Chiaki
scripts.description: With a single click mass add whole franchise entries with the status of your choice, or change the status of all entries from an entire franchise.

scripts.name: Redirect to imgur
scripts.description: Seaching for imgur on google auto redirects to https://imgur.com/upload/

scripts.name: To Do list title - Canvas Instructure
scripts.description: Shows the full TO Do task title when you hover over it on the instructure.com dashboard of your course.

scripts.name: Show course name - Canvas Instructure
scripts.description: Shows the full course name and course code of your class on any page.

scripts.name: "Not Yet Aired" Hider
scripts.description: Allows you to hide "Not Yet Aired" entries of your list.

scripts.name: AniWave Ads Hider
scripts.description: Removes all Ads from AniWave.

scripts.name: Redirect to Google Translator - Forced
scripts.description: Instantaneously redirects you to https://translate.google.com if you search for the word "translator" using your native language.

scripts.name: Anti Anti-debugger
scripts.description: Stops most (not all) anti-debugging implementations by JavaScript obfuscators and stops the console logs from being automatically cleared.

scripts.name: White Background - MAL
scripts.description: Makes MAL always use the default white background color.

scripts.name: °F+°C Weather - google
scripts.description: Shows both °F and °C weather temperatures at the same time on Google.

scripts.name: Friends Average Score - MAL
scripts.description: Show all your friends weighted score for an entry.

scripts.name: Entry History - MAL
scripts.description: Get a detailed anime/manga history with the exact month/day/year and hour:minute of when you modified the watched/completed episode number of the entry.

scripts.name: Ics Viewer - ProtonMail
scripts.description: Quickly see the .ics calendar file event information directly on your browser without having to download it or add it to any calendars!

scripts.name: Anime Recommendations - MAL
scripts.description: Get new anime recommendations whenever you open your profile page.

scripts.name: Desktop Mode - MAL
scripts.description: Forces MAL always be opened on Desktop View Mode.

scripts.name: Timer Watch
scripts.description: Displays the timer on timerminutes.com and also shows a digital clock.

scripts.name: Friend Requests Fix - MAL
scripts.description: Shows a next page button on your friends requests history, and let's you see all friends requests you got up to 3 years ago.

scripts.name: AniWave Auto Enabler
scripts.description: Automatically enables the AniWave website default auto play and auto next options.

scripts.name: Quotes Filter - MAL
scripts.description: Hide quotes from ignored users.

scripts.name: Links to titles - MAL
scripts.description: Shows entry and topic titles instead of full link urls.

scripts.name: Anime list total time - MAL
scripts.description: Shows the total amount of time you will take to watch all entries on your anime list.

scripts.name: User Blocker - MAL
scripts.description: Block any user on any forum topic with a single click!

scripts.name: ChatGPT Auto Next
scripts.description: Automatically clicks on the "Stay logged out" button on ChatGPT.

scripts.name: MAL Images Backup
scripts.description: Backups all images on forum topics, blogs and all images on anime/manga lists CSS styles.

scripts.name: My Review - MAL
scripts.description: Open your own review on any entry with a single click!

scripts.name: Episodes Average Score - MAL
scripts.description: Shows the total episodes average score on any anime entries on MAL.

scripts.name: Greasy Fork - Analyze from posted scripts
scripts.description: Shows the total amount for each rating, total/daily installs, and scripts posted on any user profile and search pages.

scripts.name: Google image tools always opened
scripts.description: Auto click on the tools button on Google Images.

scripts.name: Paste Images - MAL
scripts.description: Copy any image and paste it on MAL to get it uploaded to Imgur and have the direct image link and BBCode automatically added to the reply box!

scripts.name: MAL Signature Updater
scripts.description: Automatically update your signature!

scripts.name: Quotes - MAL
scripts.description: Brings back the original MAL quotes button! Now you can copy in a single click original BBCodes and image URLs!

scripts.name: Ultimate Popup Blocker
scripts.description: Configurable popup blocker that blocks all popup windows by default.

scripts.name: YouTube Video Duration Checker
scripts.description: Shows the duration of YouTube videos on mobile browsers.

scripts.name: Youtube - Resume
scripts.description: Automatically start videos from where it stopped.

scripts.name: Youtube - Subtitle
scripts.description: Automatically enable the subtitles.

scripts.name: Character pages Fix - MAL
scripts.description: Shows a next page button on the Top character pages and lets you see all Top character pages on MAL.

scripts.name: Default Google Translator Languages
scripts.description: Automatically selects the languages you want.

scripts.name: Increase Font Size
scripts.description: Increases the Font Size on all elements on the page.

scripts.name: Finish Airing Date - MAL
scripts.description: Calculate the expected finished airing date for anime entries and automatically open the anime entry link once it finishes airing.

scripts.name: Youtube - Subtitle (PC Version)
scripts.description: Automatically enable the subtitles.

scripts.name: Online Acrobat - Adobe
scripts.description: Unlimited free usage (without login) of all the 25+ powerful PDF and e-signing tools on the Online Adobe Acrobat tools website.

scripts.name: Hide Opened Movies - YIFY Movies
scripts.description: Hide all movies you were previously opened while browsing YTS.

scripts.name: Google Redirect Bypasser
scripts.description: Automatically opens the link after the text notice "The previous page is sending you to https://" ...

scripts.name: OneClick Tools - Canvas Instructure
scripts.description: Copy/Google with a single click on all instructure.com quizzes/exam questions of your course.

scripts.name: OneClick Tools - McGraw-Hill
scripts.description: Copy/Google with a single click on all McGraw-Hill quiz questions of your course.

scripts.name: AdBlock - TecMundo
scripts.description: Remove os ads "Assine já o The BRIEF, a newsletter diária que te deixa por dentro de tudo".

scripts.name: Canaltech - Ilimitado
scripts.description: Automaticamente clica no botao "Leia Mais" e carrega todas as noticias e artigos por completo.

scripts.name: Intro Bypasser - 17track
scripts.description: Removes the "😊 Welcome!" introduction steps.

scripts.name: techtudo - Ilimitado
scripts.description: Automaticamente clica no botao "Veja Mais" e carrega todas as noticias e artigos por completo.

scripts.name: New airing anime fix - MAL
scripts.description: Open the anime entry page instead of the season page for "The anime you plan to watch will begin airing on..." notifications.

scripts.name: Website Changes Monitor
scripts.description: A powerful and flexible monitor that automatically detects changes on any website. Including support for POST requests and even complex pages that require dynamic security tokens (nonces/CSRF) to view content.

scripts.name: Default Resolution - YouTube
scripts.description: Choose the default resolution for YouTube videos!

scripts.name: RARGB Search - YIFY Movies
scripts.description: Adds a button on YTS movie pages to search the movie title on RARGB.

scripts.name: RARGB Subtitles
scripts.description: Quickly know if a file has subtitles or not.

scripts.name: Hide dead links - RARGB
scripts.description: Hides magnet links without any seeders.

scripts.name: HD Highlighter - RARGB
scripts.description: Highlight magnet links with the 1080p (Full HD) resolution.

scripts.name: Ascending Size - RARGB
scripts.description: Automatically sorts links using the ascending size order.

scripts.name: Broken Trailer Search - YIFY Movies
scripts.description: Clicking on the YouTube Trailer embedded video will search for the movie title and year on Google if the video is broken.

scripts.name: YouTube Link to Embedded Video
scripts.description: Opens YouTube links in an iframe when the link is clicked

scripts.name: Anti adblock detector
scripts.description: Removes most (not all) adblock detectors that ask you to disable your ad blocking extension.

scripts.name: Mass Delete - Claude
scripts.description: Permanently delete conversations on claude.ai

scripts.name: Cinema Trailer - PLEX
scripts.description: Attempts to add the video trailer on all video pages on Plex!

scripts.name: YouTube Background Playback - Kiwi Browser
scripts.description: Enable YouTube background playback in Kiwi.

scripts.name: YouTube Player Controls
scripts.description: Adds features to YouTube player page: fill window with video, stretch, float video, set HD 4K 8K resolution, hide annotations and ads, click skip ads, click show more, loop, replay a video segment, pause at start/end, zoom and pan video.

scripts.name: DoesTheDogDie - Filter
scripts.description: Helps you find specific information about movies by filtering only "Yes" answers on the DoesTheDogDie website.

scripts.name: DarkMode - WebTor.io
scripts.description: Forces dark mode on WebTor.io.

scripts.name: Audio Output Picker
scripts.description: Pick a preferred audio output device for HTML5 audio and video elements.

scripts.name: Job Application Auto-Filler - WorkDay
scripts.description: Auto-fill job application forms on WorkDay by first adding all sections, then filling them.

scripts.name: Console Log Styler
scripts.description: Styles console.log() output with customizable colors, borders, and visual effects for better debugging visibility.

scripts.name: Privacy Enhancer - ProtectedText
scripts.description: Removes the ProtectedText password from your browser URL+history for increased security, while keeping you logged in.

scripts.name: Canvas Grades Submission Dates
scripts.description: Adds submission dates to the Canvas gradebook, allows sorting, and adds a copy button on the dates.

scripts.name: Canvas User Joined Date
scripts.description: Fetch each user's profile page on Canvas roster, extract the "Created" date, and add a new "Joined On" column reliably.

scripts.name: YouTube Clean & Fast (Hide UI/Spinner)
scripts.description: Hide all YouTube player UI (buttons, spinner, shadows, ads, branding, related videos suggestions when the video ends) immediately and show them only on mouse hover.

scripts.name: Audio Master: Auto Mute & Resume
scripts.description: The ultimate audio manager. Automatically mutes background tabs when a new video/audio plays. Resumes the previous audio tab when you pause. "God Mode" detection captures videos, audios, Shadow DOM, and Web Audio (Games).

name: Audio Output Picker
description: Pick a preferred audio output device for HTML5 audio and video elements.
